title: FBI Raid Warrant Arrest FOIA Request (Federal Bureau of Investigation)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Requesting information on a Raid with Julius Unknown Name Last.
On 28 December 2023 evening time frame, an FBI Raid was conducted on 10637 Seiler Rd Apartment 1103 New Haven IN 46776. Occupants that were in the apartment was Haley Lynn Mendez (18) July 22, 2005, Jannah Mae Mendez (39) March 13, 1985, and Julius Last name unknown (22).  Requesting FIOA on the situation.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Matthew Ray Mendez

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am looking for what the FBI data base is holding on me to fully understand repercussions. I am still in the Army. I am still serving in Germany. I have been reinstated. Trying to fully understand. It was an article 15 punitive punishment. 
The incident happened in the year 2021 January time frame. I plan to retire in 2027. I am a Sergeant First Class still serving pending Master Sergeant. I request information to fully understand if I can even get a job after this with what is on the FBI Data Base.

I have requested a redress number to help me fly back and forth to see my children. 	
4041933

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Matthew Ray Mendez
